resources.string: Click next to learn more about the purpose of the app\nClick skip to signup
SmartAir teaches children how to manage asthma safely while helping families and providers stay informed
Click next to learn more about rescue vs controller\nClick back to return to the previous screen\nClick skip to signup
Make sure to log the right inhaler:\nRescue for emergencies, Controller for daily protection
Click next to learn more about data security\nClick back to return to the previous screen\nClick skip to signup
By default your health data is private, parents control what information is shared with healthcare providers, so your data stays safe and private
Click next to get started!\nClick back to return to the previous screen
